LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PlateArmorHeavy.label: heavy plate armor
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PlateArmorHeavy.descriptio: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet. The plates have been reinforced which offers significantly more protection, but at the cost of mobility.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_JesterOutfit.label: jester outfit
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_JesterOutfit.description: A colorful jester outfit. It predisposes to conversation, but it's impossible to learn anything in such a suit.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_DameDress.label: дамское платье
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_DameDress.description: A beautiful full body dress for a dame. Wearing such clothes will inevitably lead to getting used to luxury, so the user will not be capable of dumb labor.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_KingsRobes.label: королевская мантия
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_KingsRobes.description: A long robe with golden chestplate, worthy of a king. Extremely beautiful.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_HeavyLeatherArmor.label: heavy leather armor
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_HeavyLeatherArmor.descript: A heavy leather breastplate meant to provide warmth and protection to heavy infantry during battles in frigid tundras. Unfortunately, this armor leaves one slowed and more vulnerable to melee attacks.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_LeatherArmor.label: кожаная броня
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_LeatherArmor.description: This armor is made much more carefully and tightly out of processed leathers, sacrificing some insulation in favor of extra protection against damage. Intended to be worn by front-line troops and often accompanied by a shield.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Tabard.label: табард
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Tabard.description: A sleeveless cloth overgarment worn over armor or clothing, designed to display the wearer's heraldry. Though it provides no protection, it proudly showcases the colors and symbol of their allegiance.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PaddedArmor.label: padded armor
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_PaddedArmor.description: A thick, quilted garment designed to absorb impacts and provide moderate protection. Often used by foot soldiers or worn under heavier armor.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Mantle.label: mantle
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_Mantle.description: A light cloak covering shoulders and neck, providing some protection from the elements.
